Package eu.tivian.hardware

Class TEDNative

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.tivian.hardware.TEDNative
  • class TEDNative
extends Object
    JNI bridge to Verilog version of TED.
    Original source code is available on Github.
    Since:
    2019-12-03
    Author:
    Pawe≈Ç Kania, Istvan Hegedus
    See Also:
    TED, FPGATED Project, TED datasheet
